title: Drawing, Study for St. Paul the Hermit, 1800–1820
title_raw: Study for St. Paul the Hermit
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The hermit is shown seated between rocks and beneath a tree.  He sleeps seated.  A loaf of bread lies before him and the raven approaches carrying something in his beak.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Study for St. Paul the Hermit, 1800–1820. Crayon, gouache. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2732
